sections.text:
71-2444.Automated Medication Systems Act; act, how cited.

Sections 71-2444 to 71-2452 shall be known and may be cited as the Automated Medication Systems Act.

SourceLaws 2008, LB308, ยง 1;Laws 2013, LB326, ยง 3.
